item.title: LayerX Raises $11 Million for Browser Security Solution
item.dc:creator: Ionut Arghire
item.description:
Browser security firm LayerX has raised $11 million in a Series A funding round extension led by Jump Capital.

The post LayerX Raises $11 Million for Browser Security Solution appeared first on SecurityWeek.

item.title: Industry Moves for the week of April 28, 2025 - SecurityWeek
item.description: Explore industry moves and significant changes in the industry for the week of April 28, 2025. Stay updated with the latest industry trends and shifts.

item.title: Cybersecurity Firms Raise Over $1.7 Billion Ahead of RSA Conference 2025
item.dc:creator: Mike Lennon
item.description:
More than 30 companies announced a total of $1.7 billion in funding in weeks leading up to the industry’s largest gathering.

The post Cybersecurity Firms Raise Over $1.7 Billion Ahead of RSA Conference 2025 appeared first on SecurityWeek.

item.title: Google Tracked 75 Zero-Days in 2024
item.dc:creator: Eduard Kovacs
item.description:
The number of exploited zero-days seen by Google in 2024 dropped to 75, from 98 observed in the previous year.

The post Google Tracked 75 Zero-Days in 2024 appeared first on SecurityWeek.

item.title: RSA Conference 2025 Announcements Summary (Day 1)
item.dc:creator: SecurityWeek News
item.description:
Hundreds of companies are showcasing their products and services this week at the 2025 edition of the RSA Conference in San Francisco.

The post RSA Conference 2025 Announcements Summary (Day 1)  appeared first on SecurityWeek.

item.title: Exploited Vulnerability Exposes Over 400 SAP NetWeaver Servers to Attacks
item.dc:creator: Ionut Arghire
item.description:
More than 400 SAP NetWeaver servers are impacted by CVE-2025-31324, an exploited remote code execution vulnerability.

The post Exploited Vulnerability Exposes Over 400 SAP NetWeaver Servers to Attacks appeared first on SecurityWeek.

item.title: CISA Warns of Exploited Broadcom, Commvault Vulnerabilities
item.dc:creator: Ionut Arghire
item.description:
CISA urges immediate patching for recently disclosed Broadcom, Commvault, and Qualitia vulnerabilities exploited in the wild.

The post CISA Warns of Exploited Broadcom, Commvault Vulnerabilities appeared first on SecurityWeek.

item.title: IBM’s $150 Billion US Investment to Boost Quantum Innovation and National Security
item.dc:creator: SecurityWeek News
item.description:
IBM will invest more than $30 billion in research and development to advance and continue its American manufacturing of mainframe and quantum computers.

The post IBM’s $150 Billion US Investment to Boost Quantum Innovation and National Security appeared first on SecurityWeek.

item.title: Palo Alto Networks to Acquire AI Security Firm Protect AI
item.dc:creator: Eduard Kovacs
item.description:
Palo Alto Networks is acquiring AI security company Protect AI in a deal previously estimated at $650-700 million.

The post Palo Alto Networks to Acquire AI Security Firm Protect AI appeared first on SecurityWeek.

item.title: NetFoundry Raises $12 Million for Network Security Solutions
item.dc:creator: Ionut Arghire
item.description:
Zero-trust network security solutions provider NetFoundry has raised $12 million in funding from SYN Ventures.

The post NetFoundry Raises $12 Million for Network Security Solutions appeared first on SecurityWeek.

item.title: JPMorgan Chase CISO Fires Warning Shot Ahead of RSA Conference
item.dc:creator: Ryan Naraine
item.description:
This tension between hard-edged risk realism and breathless AI evangelism sets an unmistakable tone for a bellwether conference where 40,000-plus gather to do business. 

The post JPMorgan Chase CISO Fires Warning Shot Ahead of RSA Conference appeared first on SecurityWeek.
